text: Margarito Pomposo Barros (1910 - 11 November 2007) was a Mexican long-distance runner. He competed in the marathon at the 1932 Summer Olympics and finished 20th. ==References== Category:1910 births Category:2007 deaths Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1932 Summer Olympics Category:Mexican male long-distance runners Category:Mexican male marathon runners Category:Olympic athletes of Mexico Category:Sportspeople from Puebla
title: Margarito Pomposo
